DOC.brief_summary: Study to evaluate the safety, tolerability, PK, PD, and food effect of AMG 357 in healthy subjects
DOC.brief_title: A Phase I Study to Evaluate the Safety, Tolerability, Pharmacokinetics (PK), Pharmacodynamics (PD), Food Effect of AMG 357 in Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: Healthy Adult subjects between 25 and 55 years old Body mass index (BMI) between 18 and 32 kg/m2 Normal or clinically acceptable physical examination, clinical laboratory values, and ECG Additional inclusion criteria apply Any history or evidence of a clinically significant disorder, condition or disease that would pose a risk to subject safety. Additional exclusion criteria apply
